quote: When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
author: Voltaire

quote: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is good because God is great.
author: Anonymous

quote: God will never let us down because his love is unconditional.
author: Anonymous

quote: God has a bigger plan for me than I have for myself.
author: Anonymous

quote: Trust that God will put the right people in your life at the right time and for the right reasons.
author: Anonymous

quote: Faith is trusting God even when you don’t understand his plan.
author: Anonymous

quote: God loves you more in a moment than anyone could in a lifetime.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don’t worry about other people’s opinions of you. God never told you to impress people; only to love them.
author: Dave Willis

quote: The Word of God is limitless and infinite.
author: Unknown

quote: God gives us difficulties to bring out the best in us.
author: Marvin J. Ashton

quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: Disappointments are just God’s way of saying – I’ve got something better. So be patient, have faith and live your life.
author: Anonymous

quote: God never takes away something from your life without replacing it with something better.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don’t treat people the way they treat you. Treat people the way God treats you.
author: Dave Willis

quote: God didn’t bring you this far to abandon you.
author: Anonymous

quote: Thank you God for everything in my life. The good and bad. Some were blessings and some were lessons.
author: Anonymous

quote: He who says I'm alone... had never listened to God who is always with him.
author: Anonymous

quote: God can turn water into wine, but he can’t turn your whining into anything.
author: Anonymous
